footer_copyright: Â© {year} SoloAI SaaS. All rights reserved.
seo_site_description: Transform your business with AI-powered solutions. SoloAI SaaS provides intelligent automation, analytics, and optimization tools for modern entrepreneurs.
seo_home_description: Welcome to SoloAI SaaS - Your AI-powered business solution platform. Start your journey to intelligent automation today.
seo_features_description: Discover powerful AI-driven features that transform your business operations. Automation, analytics, and intelligence at your fingertips.
seo_pricing_description: Choose the perfect plan for your business. Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Start free, scale as you grow.
seo_contact_description: Get in touch with our team. We're here to help you succeed with personalized support and expert guidance.
seo_privacy_description: Learn how we protect your data and respect your privacy. Transparent policies and GDPR compliance.
seo_terms_description: Read our terms of service and understand your rights. Clear, fair terms for all users.
seo_login_description: Sign in to your SoloAI SaaS account. Access your dashboard, settings, and AI-powered tools.
seo_signup_description: Create your free account today. Join thousands of businesses transforming with AI.
seo_account_description: Manage your account, subscription, and preferences. Your AI-powered business control center.
seo_forgot_password_description: Reset your password securely. Quick and easy account recovery.
error_404_message: We couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved, deleted, or the URL might be incorrect.
error_500_message: Something went wrong on our end. We're working to fix it. Please try again later.
error_generic_message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
seo_error_description: An error occurred while processing your request. We're here to help you get back on track.
login_page_subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
auth_login_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth_login_error_invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
auth_login_error_account_locked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
auth_login_error_network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
auth_login_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
auth_login_error_rate_limit: Too many login attempts. Please wait a moment and try again.
auth_login_error_email_not_verified: Please verify your email address before logging in.
auth_login_error_user_not_found: No account found with this email address.
auth_login_error_server: Server error. Please try again later.
auth_login_error_oauth_failed: Authentication with {provider} failed. Please try again.
auth_login_error_oauth_denied: Access was denied. Please try again or use a different method.
signup_page_subtitle: Join thousands of businesses transforming with AI
auth_signup_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth_signup_password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth_signup_error_email_exists: An account with this email already exists.
auth_signup_error_weak_password: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
auth_signup_error_rate_limit: Too many signup attempts. Please wait a moment and try again.
auth_signup_error_server: Server error. Please try again later.
auth_signup_error_network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
auth_signup_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
account_dashboard_subtitle: Manage your account settings and subscription
account_subscription_billing_coming_soon: Billing integration coming soon. Upgrade options will be available here.
account_logout_modal_message: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
account_error_load_failed: We couldn't load your account information. This might be due to a network issue or session expiration.
account_error_max_retries: Maximum retry attempts reached. Please refresh the page or try again later.
account_error_retry_failed: Retry failed. Please check your connection and try again.
account_error_retry_info: If the problem persists, please contact support.
account_update_name_too_long: Display name must be 100 characters or less
account_update_email_readonly: Email address cannot be changed at this time
account_update_success: Your profile has been updated successfully!
account_update_error_session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
account_update_error_rate_limit: Too many update attempts. Please wait and try again.
account_update_error_validation: Please check your input and try again.
account_update_error_server: Server error. Please try again later.
account_update_error_generic: An error occurred while updating your profile.
account_update_error_network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
account_password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
account_password_same_as_current: New password must be different from current password
account_password_success: Your password has been changed successfully!
account_password_error_session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
account_password_error_rate_limit: Too many attempts. Please wait and try again.
account_password_error_server: Server error. Please try again later.
account_password_error_generic: An error occurred while changing your password.
account_password_error_network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
billing_history_empty_description: Your payment history will appear here once you upgrade to a paid plan.
billing_card_expired_warning: Your card has expired. Please update your payment method to continue your subscription.
billing_no_payment_method_description: Add a payment method when you upgrade to a paid plan.
billing_reactivate_notice: To reactivate your subscription, visit the billing portal.
billing_cancel_modal_message: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You can continue using your current plan features until the end of your billing period.
billing_cancel_error_generic: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again.
billing_error_fetch_subscription: Unable to load subscription details. Showing cached data.
logout_force_hint: If the problem persists, you will be redirected to the login page.
pricing_page_subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for your business. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.
pricing_checkout_error: Failed to start checkout. Please try again.
pricing_free_description: Perfect for getting started and exploring the platform.
pricing_pro_description: For growing businesses that need more power.
pricing_enterprise_description: For teams that need the ultimate solution.
pricing_faq_cancel_a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
pricing_faq_upgrade_q: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
pricing_faq_upgrade_a: Absolutely! You can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect at your next billing cycle.
pricing_faq_payment_q: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing_faq_payment_a: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. We also support Apple Pay and Google Pay.
pricing_success_message: Thank you for subscribing! Your account has been upgraded.
pricing_canceled_message: Checkout was canceled. No charges were made.
